version_description: + Volume mixer
Now you can have more fun with Real Drums. Play Drums alongside most popular songs.
Various minor improvements
Various minor improvements

Dear Users!

If you like Real Drums - please rate - this is what makes new versions coming!

This version contains some pleasant improvements:
- several annoying bugs and crashes fixed
- stability improvements implemented - the app works smoother
- performance improvements implemented - the app loads faster

Enjoy!

- We have added a new Auto Cymbals feature. Now you can focus on Bass Drum/Snare bunch and play more complicated grooves.
- Performance improvements and minor bug fixes

- We have added a new Auto Cymbals feature. Now you can focus on Bass Drum/Snare bunch and play more complicated grooves.
- Performance improvements and minor bug fixes

- An advanced algorithm that produces the most realistic flow of sound!
- Performance improvements and minor bug fixes
- Performance improvements and minor bug fixes
- Performance improvements and minor bug fixes
- Performance improvements and minor bug fixes.

A long-awaited update is here! Here are the new amazing features we’ve prepared:
* Brand new striking DRUM GAME: drum along with songs from the songbook with the help of hints to get the best scores possible. Start playing instantly - no lessons needed!
* Solo mode: play your favorite tunes however you want and train your drumming skills in the well familiar but essentially enhanced mode!
* Performance and stability improvements.

* Crash-on-the-start bug fixed;
* Brand new striking DRUM GAME: drum along with songs from the songbook with the help of hints to get the best scores possible. Start playing instantly - no lessons needed!
* Solo mode: play your favorite tunes however you want and train your drumming skills in the well familiar but essentially enhanced mode!
* Performance and stability improvements.
We hope you’re enjoying the app! Please, keep it regularly updated to always have our greatest features and latest improvements.
We hope you’re enjoying the app! Please, keep it regularly updated to always have our greatest features and latest improvements.
We have added AR (Augmented reality) mode. Start your cam, locate a drumset wherever you like and start playing.

Now, you can touch the music in WeDrum, thanks to an all-new feature we’re adding exclusively for our iOS 13 users called Haptic Vibration. With this technology, you’ll physically feel every drum beat you play!

Hello, drummers! The new version of WeDrum is released! 
We fixed the critical bugs and improved the sounding so that you could enjoy drumming at its best.  
Please, keep writing to our support team, your feedback means a lot to us!

The new version of WeDrum is released!  
We fixed the critical bugs and improved the overall drumming experience so that you could tune into the playing with ease!  
Please, keep writing to our support team, your feedback means a lot to us!

In the new version of WeDrum, we’ve taken care of all critical bugs along with improving the quality of sound and touch.
Please, keep writing to our support team, your feedback means a lot to us!

We fixed the critical bugs and improved the sounding so that you could enjoy drumming at its best.  
Please, keep writing to our support team, your feedback means a lot to us!

In the new version of WeDrum we’ve taken care of all critical bugs and also improved the sounding.
Play, enjoy and keep writing to our support team - your feedback means a lot to us!

We always ensure WeDrum stays just as cool. So our latest update is all about fixing the critical bugs and bringing you the coolest sounding. Please, keep writing to our support team, your feedback means a lot to us!

Hello Drummers! In this version, we've fixed some bugs and improved the songbook.
Please keep writing your ideas and suggestions, your feedback means a lot to us!

Hello all! This new version of WeDrum includes:
- minor bug fixes, following your feedback
- improvements of the app's general performance
Keep writing to our support team, your feedback means a lot to us!
